ai_welcome:
Hello! I am Atticus - your AI advisor on human rights.

I can help with:
‚Ä¢ Explaining human rights
‚Ä¢ Providing references to laws and articles
‚Ä¢ Practical advice for rights protection
‚Ä¢ International protection mechanisms

Ask your question or choose one of the topics below!
ai_questions_police_detention: What to do in case of illegal police detention?
ai_questions_housing_rights: How to protect the right to housing during eviction?
ai_questions_court_rights: How to appeal violations of the right to judicial protection?
ai_placeholder: Type your human rights question here...
ai_tip: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
ai_disclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Consult with lawyers.
help_type_required: Please select at least one help type
additional_options_description: Additional options and information for working with the platform
sidebar_info_description: This platform is designed to promote peaceful coexistence and mutual respect among all people, based on Human Rights Policy.

moderation.description: Moderation of complaints and human rights violations statistics

right_to_life.title: Right to Life ‚Äî The Highest Value
right_to_life.content: Every person has an absolute right to biological existence. No one may be deprived of life except in exceptional, clearly defined cases. The right to life includes access to food, clean water, air, warmth, sleep, and other basic physiological needs. A person may protect their life and health either independently or together with others. In case of illness or injury, the right to timely medical and psychological assistance applies. Personal hygiene, respect for human dignity, and bodily integrity are integral components of this right. Every person has the right to use natural resources necessary for life‚Äîclean air, water, sunlight. Children under 18 years of age are under enhanced protection and have the right to constant care and attention from adults. Human Rights Policy is created precisely so that all people can coexist peacefully and respect one another, starting from the highest value‚Äîthe right to life.

freedom_of_thought_speech.title: Freedom of Thought and Freedom of Speech
freedom_of_thought_speech.content: Freedom of thought allows every person to have their own beliefs, religious views, philosophical ideas, or political positions without any coercion, intimidation, or persecution. Freedom of speech enables open expression of one's thoughts in oral, written, artistic, or other forms. This right also includes the free dissemination of information, exchange of knowledge and ideas with others without censorship or punishment for the content of what is said or written. Restrictions are possible only in extreme cases where the rights of other people are violated. Human Rights Policy is aimed at peaceful coexistence and mutual respect‚Äîwhich is why freedom of thought and speech is the foundation for dialogue, not conflict.

freedom_of_action.title: Various Manifestations of Freedom of Action
freedom_of_action.content: A person has the right to move freely, provided this does not violate the rights of others. They can independently choose a profession, activity, hobby, lifestyle, place of residence, partner for creating a family. Freedom of association allows joining with others in organizations, clubs, communities based on interests. A person has the right to care for loved ones, children, parents, friends, or even strangers. Self-expression through clothing, creativity, behavior, art is also protected. The right to freely disseminate information‚Äîto transmit facts, ideas, thoughts to others without restrictions, unless it violates the rights of others‚Äîis separately recognized. Additionally, an adult person has the full right to consciously refuse parenthood‚Äînot to have children if they do not wish to. All of this exists in Human Rights Policy so that people can live peacefully, respecting each other's choices and freedoms.

right_to_property.title: Right to Property in All Its Forms
right_to_property.content: Every person can own material things‚Äîhousing, transport, land, money, personal belongings. Property can be individual or communal. In addition to material property, there is non-material property‚Äîcopyright, right to name, honor, reputation, privacy; these can also be individual or communal. Property is inviolable‚Äîit cannot be arbitrarily taken away. A person has the right to protect property from encroachment. A person has the right to receive income from their property, freely dispose of it, pass it on by inheritance, grant others the right to use it. A special type of usage right is servitude‚Äîthe right of limited use of another's property (for example, right of passage through another's land to one's own property, right to lay utilities, etc.) if necessary for normal use of one's own property. In case of damage or destruction of property, full compensation for the harm is provided. Human Rights Policy supports peaceful coexistence through protection of property rights, which ensures people's stability in owning the results of their labor and guarantees respect for their property rights.

right_to_weapons_for_defense.title: Right to Own Weapons for Protection
right_to_weapons_for_defense.content: A person has the right to own weapons exclusively for the purpose of protecting their own life, health, property, as well as the life and health of loved ones. This right directly follows from the right to self-defense and collective defense. It is not unlimited‚Äîpossession and use of weapons is possible only for the purpose of protecting rights, to prevent abuse and threat to society. This approach reflects the purpose of Human Rights Policy: to promote peaceful coexistence, allowing people to protect themselves, but not providing an opportunity for aggression or violence.

equality_before_law.title: Equality Before the Law and Fair Court
equality_before_law.content: All people are absolutely equal before the law regardless of gender, age, nationality, property status, religion, or other characteristics. Everyone has the right to an independent, competent, and impartial court. Court proceedings must be public so that society can monitor fairness. A person is considered innocent until their guilt is proven by a lawful court decision. Access to court is open to all, cases are considered within reasonable timeframes, parties have equal rights and opportunities to present evidence. Equality before the law is the foundation of mutual respect and peaceful coexistence proclaimed by Human Rights Policy.

right_to_appeal_translation_enforcement.title: Right to Appeal, Translation, and Enforcement of Decisions
right_to_appeal_translation_enforcement.content: Any court decision can be appealed to higher instances according to the law. If a person does not speak the language of proceedings, they have the right to full translation of documents, explanations, and hearings in their native language. Court decisions must be enforced effectively, timely, and completely. Safety of all participants is ensured during the process. The decision must be fair, reasoned, and comply with legal norms. These guarantees are created so that people feel mutual respect and trust in the system, which promotes peaceful coexistence.

protection_from_judicial_errors.title: Protection from Judicial Errors and Right to Know Reasons for Restrictions
protection_from_judicial_errors.content: If a court makes an erroneous decision that has caused harm to a person, they must receive moral and material compensation. Every person has the right to be immediately and fully informed about any restriction of their rights, as well as the specific reasons for such restriction. This protection is necessary to maintain trust and mutual respect among people.

protection_of_human_dignity.title: Protection of Human Dignity and Personal Integrity
protection_of_human_dignity.content: Human dignity is an absolute value that cannot be violated under any circumstances. Torture, cruel treatment, humiliation, any violence are prohibited. A person's body is inviolable‚Äîany medical or other intervention is possible only with voluntary consent or in exceptional, clearly defined cases. Psychological integrity is also protected: intimidation, blackmail, psychological pressure are prohibited. Respect for dignity and integrity is the foundation of mutual respect among all people, for which Human Rights Policy was created.

protection_of_children_right_to_refuse_p.title: Special Protection of Children and Right to Refuse Parenthood
protection_of_children_right_to_refuse_p.content: Children under 18 years of age are under special protection of parents and society. They are guaranteed safety, comprehensive development, education, adequate nutrition, medical assistance, and care. At the same time, an adult person has the full right to consciously refuse parenthood‚Äînot to have children if they do not wish to. Such a decision must be respected without judgment, coercion, or discrimination. These rules help build peaceful coexistence where both children's rights to protection and adults' rights to their own life choices are respected.

answers.food_water_air_warmth_sleep: access to food, clean water, air, warmth, sleep
answers.yes_collective_defense: yes, this is the right to collective defense
answers.when_violate_rights_of_others: only when expressions violate the rights of others
answers.ban_officials_criticism: ban on any criticism of officials
answers.only_if_no_children: only if there are no children
answers.limited_use_of_others_property: right of limited use of another's property
answers.full_disposal_of_others_property: right of full disposal of another's property
answers.protect_life_health_property: protection of life, health and property
answers.only_for_defense_no_aggression: no, only for defense, without the right to aggression
answers.equality_regardless_of_gender_age_nation: absolute equality regardless of gender, age, nationality
answers.depends_on_wealth: depends on wealth, number of bank cards
answers.innocent_until_proven_guilty: a person is innocent until proven guilty in court
answers.not_for_minors: presumption does not apply to minors
answers.guilty_until_proven_otherwise: a person is guilty until proven otherwise
answers.yes_for_societal_control: yes, so that society can control fairness
answers.only_in_criminal_cases: only in criminal cases with many victims
answers.translation_native_language: right to translation and hearing in native language
answers.reasons_for_any_rights_restriction: reasons for any restriction of their rights
answers.only_in_emergency_cases: only in exceptional, clearly defined cases
answers.safety_development_education_care: right to safety, development, education, care
answers.yes_intimidation_blackmail_forbidden: yes, intimidation, blackmail, psychological pressure are forbidden
answers.only_own_children: only own children and friends of children
answers.close_family_friends_strangers: close ones, children, parents, friends, strangers
answers.no_if_not_violate_others_rights: no, if it doesn't violate the rights of others
answers.right_to_free_information_dissemination: right to free dissemination of information
answers.case_not_drag_too_long: so that the case doesn't drag on excessively long
answers.yes_integral_part_of_right_to_life: yes, it's an integral part of the right to life
answers.until_court_decision_final: until the court decision becomes legally binding
answers.strengthen_officials_control: strengthening control by officials and military groups
answers.peaceful_coexistence_mutual_respect: promoting peaceful coexistence and mutual respect among people

privacy_respects: respects your privacy, but at the same time emphasizes: most of the platform's functionality is created for anonymous or pseudonymous dissemination of information.
privacy_data_content: Content of complaints, posts, help requests, comments, files (photos, videos, PDF)
privacy_data_geolocation: Geolocation data (address, coordinates) that you enter yourself
privacy_technical_cookies: Cookies / local storage (for authorization and settings)
privacy_dont_precise_location: Precise device location without your explicit action
privacy_dont_payment_cards: Payment card data (if there are no donations)
privacy_dont_passport: Passport data, phone numbers (if not voluntarily provided)
privacy_purpose_display: Displaying your content to other users
privacy_purpose_analytics: Usage analytics (aggregated, not linked to person)
privacy_basis_contract_description: providing you access to the service
privacy_storage_content: Content you have published publicly - stored indefinitely until deleted by you or us.
privacy_deletion_account: Account deletion - deletes the profile, but does NOT delete already published public content (complaints, posts), as it may have already been distributed by other users.
privacy_no_selling: We DO NOT sell your data.
privacy_your_rights_gdpr: Your rights (GDPR, if you are in EU/EEA/UK)
privacy_rights_contact: To exercise these rights - write to humanrightsdao@gmail.com.
privacy_transfers_description: Data may be transferred to the USA and other countries outside the EU.
privacy_mechanism_adequacy: Adequacy decision (if the country is recognized by the European Commission)
privacy_security_description: We apply reasonable technical and organizational measures, but cannot guarantee 100% protection (there is no absolute security on the internet).
privacy_changes_description: We may change this policy. Continued use = consent.
privacy_acceptance: By agreeing to this Policy, you confirm that you have read it.
terms_description: is a decentralized user-generated content platform that allows users to voluntarily post information about alleged human rights violations, requests for assistance, country ratings and other materials.
terms_nature_of_platform: Nature of the Platform - We are NOT a publisher, only a platform
terms_technical_provider_description: The Platform only provides the technical ability to post, store and display content uploaded by users. We do not create, edit, approve, verify for accuracy or are responsible for any content posted by users (including complaints, posts, comments, coordinates, photos, videos, help requests).
terms_user_responsibility_description: All content is solely the opinion and responsibility of the user who posted it. The Platform is not a publisher, mass media, news agency or body engaged in journalistic activities.
terms_not_official_description: Posting a complaint, post or request for assistance is NOT an official appeal to state authorities, international organizations, police, prosecutors or courts and does NOT replace such appeals.
terms_prohibited_content_description: You agree NOT to post content that
terms_prohibited_law_violation: violates the laws of any country (defamation, slander, insult to honor and dignity, incitement to hatred, calls for violence, terrorism, extremism, etc.)
terms_prohibited_personal_data: contains personal data of third parties without their consent (doxxing)
terms_prohibited_intellectual_property: violates the intellectual property of third parties
terms_prohibited_child_exploitation: contains child pornography, child exploitation, human trafficking
terms_as_is_description: The Platform is provided "AS IS" without any warranties - express or implied.
terms_limitation_2: the accuracy, legality of any content
terms_limitation_3: consequences of using information from the Platform
terms_limitation_4: damage to reputation, health, property, safety as a result of using the Platform
terms_limitation_5: technical failures, data loss, hacker attacks
terms_damages_exclusion_description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we exclude any liability for direct, indirect, incidental, special, punitive damages.
terms_license_grant_description: By posting content, you grant the Platform a perpetual, free, non-exclusive, worldwide license to store, reproduce, display, distribute, modify (only for the technical needs of the platform) such content.
terms_right_to_remove_description: We have the right (but NOT obligation) to delete, hide, block any content at any time without prior notice and without explanation.
terms_no_notification_description: We are not obligated to notify the user about the deletion of their content.
terms_evidence_obligations: Your obligations regarding evidence and geolocation
terms_evidence_obligations_description: You guarantee that any address, GPS coordinates, photos, videos, documents
terms_evidence_privacy: do not violate the privacy rights of third parties
terms_evidence_criminal: are not part of criminal activity
terms_access_termination_description: We have the right to block your account or delete content without notice for any violation of these Terms.
terms_changes_description: We may change these Terms at any time. Continued use of the platform after changes = your agreement.
terms_governing_law_description: These Terms are governed by the laws of the State of Wyoming, United States (or such other jurisdiction in which an entity associated with this Platform may be incorporated or registered in the future), without regard to its conflict of laws principles.
terms_dispute_resolution_description: Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these Terms or the use of the Platform shall, to the extent possible, be resolved through negotiations. In the event that an amicable settlement cannot be reached, such disputes shall be finally and bindingly resolved by arbitration in accordance with the rules of [JAMS / ICC / HKIAC / or such other institutional arbitral body as may be selected at the time of incorporation], in effect on the date the request for arbitration is submitted. The seat (place) of arbitration shall be [city to be determined, for example, Delaware / New York / Singapore / London], and the language of the arbitration shall be English. Until the official incorporation or registration of the organization as a DAO LLC (or other legal form) in the relevant jurisdiction, these Terms shall be governed by the law most closely connected with the activities of the Platform, and disputes may be submitted to the courts of general jurisdiction at the place of residence or domicile of the claimant or respondent, or otherwise in accordance with the applicable law. The Platform intends to incorporate or register an organization in one of the DAO-friendly jurisdictions (for example, the State of Wyoming, United States, or the Republic of the Marshall Islands), after which these provisions may be further specified or amended.
terms_acceptance: By agreeing to these Terms, you confirm that you have read, understood and fully accept them.
